targets.queryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(tail_risk_category, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(tail_risk_category, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT cvar_to_income_ratio AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT cvar_to_income_ratio AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT macro_stress_score AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT macro_stress_score AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(margin_call_buffer_status, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(margin_call_buffer_status, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(health_status, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT UPPER(COALESCE(health_status, 'n/a')) AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, drawdown_depth_pct AS "Drawdown Depth %", var_95_1d_pct AS "VaR 95 1d %", cvar_95_1d_pct AS "CVaR 95 1d %" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, drawdown_depth_pct AS "Drawdown Depth %", var_95_1d_pct AS "VaR 95 1d %", cvar_95_1d_pct AS "CVaR 95 1d %" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, macro_stress_score AS "Macro Stress", macro_vix AS "VIX", macro_yield_spread_10y_2y AS "10Y-2Y Spread" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, macro_stress_score AS "Macro Stress", macro_vix AS "VIX", macro_yield_spread_10y_2y AS "10Y-2Y Spread" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, weight_pct, var_95_1d_pct, cvar_95_1d_pct, max_drawdown_1y_pct, risk_quality_category FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY cvar_95_1d_pct ASC LIMIT 8;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT symbol, weight_pct, var_95_1d_pct, cvar_95_1d_pct, max_drawdown_1y_pct, risk_quality_category FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY cvar_95_1d_pct ASC LIMIT 8;

targets.queryText: SELECT as_of_date_local, COALESCE(health_status,'n/a') AS health_status, coverage_derived_pct, coverage_missing_pct, coverage_filled_pct, prices_as_of_utc, schema_version FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT as_of_date_local, COALESCE(health_status,'n/a') AS health_status, coverage_derived_pct, coverage_missing_pct, coverage_filled_pct, prices_as_of_utc, schema_version FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
